captions.text: - Oh man, this is so embarrassing.
BuzzFeed presents
People Share Horrifying Pee Stories
I was in fifth grade
and something funny happened.
I don't remember what
and I started laughing.

And I was like, "Uh-oh,
I kinda have to pee."
But I was laughing so hard

that, like, I just lost
control of my bladder.
So I just kinda dropped to the ground,
like, on my knees
and completely peed my pants.
And then, like, the teacher noticed

and came over and like,
took his jacket off
and wrapped it around my waist
and like, walked me inside.
Like walk in the nurses office

and she gives me, like,
a random pair of pants
from the lost and found

that I had to wear for
the rest of the day.
- So the sleepwalking didn't end though
for me as a child.

About five years ago I
feel asleep at a party

and I was woken up by
somebody, like, shaking me
because I was peeing in someone's closet.
- When I was around four or five years old
I went to Chuck-E-Cheese's for a birthday.

And she was trying to do her
best to be a good chaperone

and I kept pulling on
her and that was the age
when you couldn't go to the bathroom
without your parent accompanying you.

So I was just really pissed
off because she kept refusing

and she kept saying, "No Eugene,
you do not go by yourself.
"Go, go do it yourself."
And I just start screaming and crying
and as that happens, I pull down my pants
and my underwear as Chuck-E-Cheese himself
scoops me up.
He goes, "What's the matter little kid?"

And I just pee all over
Chuck-E-Cheese's face.

Yeah, that's how I got
banned from Chuck-E-Cheese.

For even more wonderful things
subscribe to BuzzFeed Yellow
Subscribe
BuzzFeed presents

comments.text:
Once, while I was in a karate class after school, there was a little boy 
who needed to use the restroom. He decided not to tell anyone, and was just 
standing there dancing. Eventually I asked him what was wrong, but before 
he could say anything, he peed himself, and it splashed up on my karate 
gear. He was so embarrassed, cuz he had a crush on me at the time... Poor 
kid...﻿

comments.text:
I have 2 stories:

So one time I was in church as this little kid (and I did not know leaving 
to go to the toilet was bad at the time) and I asked my mom if I could go 
to the toilet. But it would make too much noise if we opened the door that 
went to the toilet, so we went out a little tiny door behind us so I could 
go pee in the bushes. My mom went with me and for the first time ever I 
peed standing up, in front of the bushes. Then on the parking lot between a 
primary school and the church this car turned on and the flashlight were 
pointed at me and my mom. It was embarrassing. So embarrassing I almost 
never pee in the bushes again. Heck, I rarely pee while standing up! What 
is wrong with me?!

The second one was while I was a few years older. It was summer holiday, 
and I went to Luxembourg. On the drive back home I said halfway the ride 
(Belgium) that I needed to pee. My mom didn't want to stop and go to a 
restaurant so she made me pee, again, in some bushes. Right behind the 
bushes was another road, and behind THAT was a busy centre. So I took my 
pants down (my zipper was stuck) and peed. But I did a whoopsie and it went 
all over my underpants. So my mom lifted me up into the air, pulled my 
pants off of my legs, followed by my underpants, and then put my pants 
back. I had a feeling people could see me. For the whole ride back to my 
country I had no underpants.﻿

over my shorts and underwear, and I was four hours from home and in the 
middle of a field where only a bus can get you back, and I had pee pants. 
Yeah great. 
You boys are so lucky you can per standing up. ﻿

comments.text:
Ok, this is recent, and totally embarrassing, but also funny as hell. So, a 
little more than a week ago, April 19th, I fell down the stairs- on my way 
to the ladies room at church- just before the service. Went to the ER, with 
what looked like a broken leg. So I'm there in a bed in ER, sobbing from 
pain, and I had to pee. *Still* had to, because that was what I'd been on 
my way to do when I fell! Well, they wouldn't let me out of the bed because 
we were still waiting for the guy from xray. And the need just got worse, 
until I finally had to say something to the nurse. So she got a bedpan for 
me. Well, I'd never used one before. And I was still dressed. Imagine this- 
a nurse and my roommate, pulling the Sunday clothes- which included nylons 
and f*cking *SPANX*- off of this sobbing middle-aged lady, while in a 
hospital bed. And not touching the leg.

*Then* there was the little problem of trying to pee- it's been almost 50 
years since I learned that pee goes in the potty and no where else. So I 
had the pan, and I had to go, but I couldn't go! The nurse had to turn on 
the tap to remind my body what to do...

Oh- and while everyone said 'Damn, that's a broken leg!', when the films 
came back they were all amazed. Not broken. But I do have a serious 
periosteal hematoma, and I'll be off my feet for 6-8 weeks while that 
heals. Leg looks and hurts like hell, and after a week, I'm bored out of my 
skull.﻿

When I was 8, I had a horrible teacher. It was 10 minutes till the end of 
school and I asked her if I could use the bathroom. She replied with "no, 
because you just have to wait 10 minutes!". We then have a guy come in and 
talk to us about toothpaste for the remaining 10 minutes. All 30 of us had 
to go behind our chairs and wait there while he spoke to us about brushing 
our teeth and staying orally healthy. By then I was VERY desperate to go to 
the toilet that I asked again and she replied with "We've only got 4 
minutes left!" I said I was very desperate and she said "Well you're just 
going to have to wet yourself!" Infront of everyone and they all laught at 
me. About 30 seconds before the bell went my bladder decided that I 
couldn't hold it any longer. I'm just glad I was wearing trousers because 
if I was wearing a skirt that would have been contraversial and I would of 
had to just pee like a dog. I just stood there, letting my trousers get 
soaked with pee. There were little drips of pee on the floor. LUCKILY the 
only person who noticed it was the person next to me, but he didn't tell 
anyone. As the bell went I rushed into the bathroom in my pee soaked 
trousers, locked the door and took of my trousers, not knowing what to do. 
I had a lift off my dad who I couldn't tell, so I had to do the best a 
could to get rid of the pee. I rung out my trousers into the toilet but 
that still didn't really work, so I tried again. I was left with very damn 
with pee black trousers to put on. I rushed to my dad's car and as soon as 
I got home I changed.


Worst day everrrrr 😂😒﻿

comments.text:
1: When I was 5, I was sitting in a cart at the checkout. I told my mom I 
had to go to the bathroom and she asked if I could wait. I knew I couldn't, 
but i thought it'd be nice of me to lie and tell her I could. Literally 
seconds after I told her I could hold it, I peed my pants. A torrent of pee 
that could only be compared to Niagara Falls started pouring through the 
holes of the cart. Every eye in the store was on me in horror as my 
dripping pee filled the otherwise silent room with the sound of my dignity 
crashing to the floor. As if that weren't bad enough, I had to wear my 
younger brother's spare diaper the whole ride home because I had no extra 
clothes with.

2: I want to say this was several years ago because it was so embarrassing, 
but it was actually last week. This guy and I were having a great night 
together and decided it would be a good idea to "finish" the night off with 
a "little" vodka. We both ended up getting EXTREMELY drunk. Now before I go 
any further, I think it's necessary to let you all know that I really like 
this guy and we'd confessed our feelings shortly prior to what's about to 
happen. I was puking more than I thought was possible, him standing right 
next to me and comforting me, when I was overcome with the urge to pee. 
Without even thinking, I casually pull my pants down and begin to pee on 
the ground, all while making eye contact with him. He asks "are you 
peeing?" And I was just like "mhmmm", as if it were no big deal. And only 
minutes later, i kissed him (terribly) :O. He turned out to be a really 
sweet guy though and we always joke about it now, but in the midst of my 
monumental hangover the next morningI was ready to die of humiliation. ﻿

comments.text:
Ok i have a horrifying pee story. So when i was about 10 i was at old navy 
looking at clothes with my mom. I had to pee REALLY bad, so i kept asking 
my mom, " mom i really gotta pee, can i go to the bathroom PLEAE??" of 
course my mom said no. Then she gave me some clothes to try on. So i went 
to the dressing room. I needed to go really bad.. So i peed all over the 
floor in the dressing room on the old navy clothes....﻿
